description: This table contains information about the providers that will perform the requested procedure.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item contains the providers that will perform the requested procedure.

columns.name: PROC_PROV_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the service for the performing provider.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROC_PROV_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the role of the performing provider.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Primary

columns.name: PROC_PROV_PANEL_NUM
columns.description: This item contains which panel the performing provider is on.
